channel.title: Rs2007 - 100 erorrs! rep++
channel.description:
Hey,
So i downloaded RS2007 and compiled and it has got 100 errors. I haven't touched anything i think they came with the source.. Some one please help or give me another copy. Rep++
[code] ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\quest\impl\TutorialIsland.java:9: package org.hyper ion.rs2.content.skills.news does not exist import org.hyperion.rs2.content.skills.news.Fishing; ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\InterfaceState.java:304: cannot find symbol symbol : class Cooking location: class org.hyperion.rs2.model.InterfaceState Cooking cooking = (Cooking) player.getAttributes ().get("cooking"); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\InterfaceState.java:304: cannot find symbol symbol : class Cooking location: class org.hyperion.rs2.model.InterfaceState Cooking cooking = (Cooking) player.getAttributes ().get("cooking"); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\InterfaceState.java:394: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Smelting location: class org.hyperion.rs2.model.InterfaceState case Smelting.INTERFACE: ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\InterfaceState.java:395: cannot find symbol symbol : class Bar location: class org.hyperion.rs2.model.InterfaceState Bar bar = (Bar) player.getAttributes().get("smel ting_bar"); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\InterfaceState.java:395: cannot find symbol symbol : class Bar location: class org.hyperion.rs2.model.InterfaceState Bar bar = (Bar) player.getAttributes().get("smel ting_bar"); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\InterfaceState.java:397: cannot find symbol symbol : class Smelting location: class org.hyperion.rs2.model.InterfaceState new Smelting(player, bar, amount).begin( ); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\impl\CookingAction.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : variable HeatSource location: class org.hyperion.rs2.action.impl.CookingAction if(heatSource == HeatSource.STOVE) ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\impl\CookingAction.java:84: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CookingItem location: class org.hyperion.rs2.action.impl.CookingAction String s = cookingItem == CookingItem.LOBSTER ? "You roa st a lobster." : ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\impl\ProspectingAction.java:36: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Rock location: class org.hyperion.rs2.action.impl.ProspectingAction if(TutorialIsland.getStage(player) == 16 && rock == Rock.TIN) { ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\impl\ProspectingAction.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Rock location: class org.hyperion.rs2.action.impl.ProspectingAction } else if(TutorialIsland.getStage(player) == 17 && rock == Rock. COPPER){ ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\impl\RockRespawnEvent.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Rock location: class org.hyperion.rs2.event.impl.RockRespawnEvent if(rock == Rock.CLAY) ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\impl\TreeRespawnEvent.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Tree location: class org.hyperion.rs2.event.impl.TreeRespawnEvent if(tree == Tree.NORMAL || tree == Tree.ACHEY) ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\impl\TreeRespawnEvent.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Tree location: class org.hyperion.rs2.event.impl.TreeRespawnEvent if(tree == Tree.NORMAL || tree == Tree.ACHEY) ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\RS2Server.java:78: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CastleWars location: class org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server CastleWars.getSingleton(); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\ActionButtonPacketHandler.java:1258: cannot find sym bol symbol : variable Smelting location: class org.hyperion.rs2.packet.ActionButtonPacketHandler case Smelting.INTERFACE: ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\ActionButtonPacketHandler.java:1259: cannot find sym bol symbol : variable Smelting location: class org.hyperion.rs2.packet.ActionButtonPacketHandler Smelting.handleInterfaceButtons(player, button); 1.) You either need to import the classes.
2.) When you downlaoded it, it is missing a { or }. Go through and look, it isn’t hard. To make it easier use an IDE.
